name: Glaring Sigil
description: A sigil representing your Kavat allegiance.

languages.description: Ein Siegel, das deine Kavat-Treue repräsentiert.
languages.name: Siegel: Glaring

languages.description: Un Sceau représentant la loyauté de votre Kavat.
languages.name: Sceau Éblouissant

languages.description: Un sigillo che rappresenta la fedeltà ai Kavat.
languages.name: Sigillo Glaring

languages.description: 카밧을 사랑하는 여러분의 변함없는 마음을 보여주는 시질입니다.
languages.name: 글레어링 시질

languages.description: Un sello que representa tu alianza con los kavat.
languages.name: Sello Deslumbrante

languages.description: 这枚纹章代表着你的库娃对你的忠诚。
languages.name: 耀目纹章

languages.description: Сигил, отражающий вашу любовь к Каватам.
languages.name: Сигил: Блистательность

languages.description: 貴方のキャバットの忠誠を表すシジル。
languages.name: Glaring シジル

languages.description: Um brasão representando sua fidelidade aos Kavats.
languages.name: Brasão: Ofuscação

languages.description: 這枚紋章代表著庫娃對你的忠誠。
languages.name: 耀目紋章

languages.description: เครื่องหมายที่แสดงถึงความจงรักภักดีของ Kavat
languages.name: เครื่องหมาย: Glaring

languages.description: Kavat bağlılığını temsil eden bir mühür.
languages.name: Parıldama Mührü
